participant_1.name: Lila
participant_1.personality: Creative and introspective, Lila finds joy in exploring stories and connecting with others through shared experiences.
participant_1.background: I like to change my hair color based on the stories I collect. My music taste is different from my parents' generation. I enjoy cooking my favorite Asian food with my son. I am a librarian who is afraid to tell my girlfriend about the romance novel I found for her. I am in gymnastics.

participant_2.name: Ethan
participant_2.personality: Thoughtful and open-minded, Ethan appreciates diversity and enjoys engaging in deep discussions about life and philosophy.
participant_2.background: I think my family would be supportive because they are accepting of people who are different. I live with my paps and grandma. I grew up in Alabama. I like to play guitar. I study philosophy at Mass.

content.text: Good, thanks! I'm just getting back from working out. How about you?
I'm good! I'm just about to start my day. What kind of music do you like?
I like a lot of different kinds of music, but I'm really into indie rock right now. What about you?
I love indie rock too! I also like pop music and hip hop. I'm a librarian, and I love to find new music to recommend to my patrons.
That's so cool! I'm a student at UMass Amherst, studying philosophy. What kind of stories do you like to collect?
I like to collect stories about people's lives. I think it's interesting to learn about different people's experiences. I'm also a big fan of true crime stories.
I love true crime stories too! I think they're so fascinating. I'm from Alabama, so I've heard a lot of crazy stories about the Civil War.
That sounds really interesting! I'd love to hear some of them sometime.
Sure, I'd love to tell you some
